    "file_path": "h2q_project/train_fractal.py",
    "content": "import torch
import torch.nn as nn
import torch.optim as optim
from torch.utils.data import DataLoader, Dataset

# Dummy fractal dataset
class FractalDataset(Dataset):
    def __init__(self, length):
        self.length = length
        self.data = torch.randn(length, 10)
        self.labels = torch.randint(0, 2, (length,)) # Binary classification

    def __len__(self):
        return self.length

    def __getitem__(self, idx):
        return self.data[idx], self.labels[idx]

# Dummy fractal model
class FractalModel(nn.Module):
    def __init__(self):
        super(FractalModel, self).__init__()
        self.layer1 = nn.Linear(10, 20)
        self.layer2 = nn.Linear(20, 2)

    def forward(self, x):
        x = torch.relu(self.layer1(x))
        x = self.layer2(x)
        return x

# Trainer class (reusable)
class Trainer:
    def __init__(self, model, optimizer, criterion, device):
        self.model = model.to(device)
        self.optimizer = optimizer
        self.criterion = criterion
        self.device = device

    def train_epoch(self, data_loader):
        self.model.train()
        running_loss = 0.0
        for inputs, labels in data_loader:
            inputs = inputs.to(self.device)
            labels = labels.to(self.device)

            self.optimizer.zero_grad()
            outputs = self.model(inputs)
            loss = self.criterion(outputs, labels)
            loss.backward()
            self.optimizer.step()

            running_loss += loss.item()
        return running_loss / len(data_loader)

    def evaluate(self, data_loader):
        self.model.eval()
        running_loss = 0.0
        with torch.no_grad():
            for inputs, labels in data_loader:
                inputs = inputs.to(self.device)
                labels = labels.to(self.device)

                outputs = self.model(inputs)
                loss = self.criterion(outputs, labels)
                running_loss += loss.item()
        return running_loss / len(data_loader)


def main():
    # Hyperparameters
    learning_rate = 0.001
    batch_size = 32
    epochs = 10
    device = torch.device("cuda" if torch.cuda.is_available() else "cpu")

    # Data
    train_dataset = FractalDataset(length=1000)
    test_dataset = FractalDataset(length=200)
    train_loader = DataLoader(train_dataset, batch_size=batch_size, shuffle=True)
    test_loader = DataLoader(test_dataset, batch_size=batch_size, shuffle=False)

    # Model, Optimizer, Criterion
    model = FractalModel()
    optimizer = optim.Adam(model.parameters(), lr=learning_rate)
    criterion = nn.CrossEntropyLoss()

    # Trainer
    trainer = Trainer(model, optimizer, criterion, device)

    # Training loop
    for epoch in range(epochs):
        train_loss = trainer.train_epoch(train_loader)
        test_loss = trainer.evaluate(test_loader)
        print(f'Epoch {epoch+1}, Train Loss: {train_loss:.4f}, Test Loss: {test_loss:.4f}')

if __name__ == "__main__":
    main()"
  }
]
